document_data.name: Zephyros
document_data.mainbody: '''Zephyros''' was an eccentric [[cloud giant]] wizard sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.Personality: Zephyros was very open-minded to "small folks".
document_data.Activities: Zephyros lived in his floating [[Tower of Zephyros]].
document_data.History: For fifty years, he studied the [[Moonshae Isles]]. In the late 1480s or early 1490s [[DR]], after the shattering of the [[Ordning (social structure)|''ordning'']], Zephyros started working to find a solution for this crisis using the ''[[contact other plane]]'' spell. This somehow led him to [[Nightstone]] village just after some others cloud giants had bombarded the place. Zephyros was instructed by a [[Planar Sphere]] creature that an adventuring party he would find there could reconstruct the ''ordning''.
